articles.title: Testing to design: How AI is changing the fabric of India's garment industry
articles.author: Ashni Dhaor
articles.summary: Paramount Instruments launched 'GSM AI,' an AI-powered device that calculates fabric density within seconds, eliminating the need for traditional tools. RDX Digital Technologies launched 'Ardix,' an AI-powered printing software that generates designs from scratch within seconds and allows customers to see how the design would look on different body types. A Beta version of Ardix is set to be launched by Feb-end.

articles.title: Sherwood Park app developers wield Canadian pride against threat of U.S. tariffs
articles.author: Lindsay Morey
articles.summary: Two developers, William Boytinck and Matthew Suddaby, launched the "Shop Canadian" app on February 5th. The app allows users to scan product barcodes to determine if they are made in Canada, utilizing company data and crowd-sourcing. Within a week, the app reached number one in Canadian downloads and registered nearly 10,000 companies and 15,000 products.

articles.title: These Silk Pillowcases Are an Affordable Bedtime Luxury. Just Don't Expect Miracles.
articles.summary: Quince offers silk pillowcases made from Chinese mulberry silk with a zipper closure, available in multiple sizes and colors, priced around $40-$50.  The pillowcases are comparable in quality to more expensive options like Slip, with a 22-momme density, and hold up well in the wash, making them a quick, affordable upgrade.

articles.title: Anglia Market Launches Extensive Online Shopping Destination for UK Families
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Anglia Market launched a new comprehensive online shopping platform in the UK. The platform aims to provide a one-stop shopping destination combining convenience with quality and value.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) Review: A Design-First, Mid-Range Challenger
articles.author: Dean Blake
articles.summary: Nothing OS 3.0 update was launched for the Nothing Phone (2), introducing improvements to the user experience. The update fixed issues related to closing apps and incorporated user feedback. The brand is also planning to launch Nothing Phone (3a) soon.

articles.title: Double magnetic rings are here to stick your phone to anything
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Double-magnetic ring mounts, priced between $10 and $25, are emerging as a versatile phone accessory.  These mounts offer hands-free convenience and can attach to various surfaces like phones, refrigerators, and car vents. Users find them beneficial for video calls, navigation, and multitasking, despite some concerns about bulkiness.

articles.title: We tried Belfast's newest lunch spot that has been queued out the door!
articles.author: Content Creator
articles.summary: Slabz has launched a new store in Belfast, specializing in American-style sandwiches, offering both set menu options and a 'create your own' option. The menu includes hot and cold sandwiches like the Bronx Hog Slobber, with prices ranging from £5.50 to £9.

articles.title: Over 10,000 baby soothers recalled due to choking risk
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Competition and Consumer Protection Commission (CCPC) recalled '123 baby Essentials Orthodontic Style Soothers 2pk' due to a choking hazard identified after product safety tests showed the soother shield could break, creating small parts. Consumers are advised to immediately stop using the recalled soothers and return them for a full refund from retailers and pharmacies including EuroGiant.

articles.title: Amazon has a secret sale section exclusively for Prime members — clothing, tech and more up to 61% off
articles.author: Sierra Hoeger
articles.summary: Amazon offers a range of products, including thermal fleece gloves with touchpads, nail polish sets, skin care kits with reusable handles, and hair dryers with multiple settings. Additionally, they feature accessories like tablet styluses compatible with iPads, surround sound headphones, 3-in-1 charging devices for Apple products, fitness trackers, AAA batteries, washing machine tablets, chicken shredders, travel packing cubes, and humidifiers.

articles.title: CNET reviews: The best cordless vacuum cleaners
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: LG's CordZero A949 cordless vacuum features self-emptying, Kompressor, Power Mop Pro, and strong suction. Dyson's V15 Detect has 230 air watts of suction, a Laser Slim Fluffy cleaner head, and a readout displaying dirt particle size. Levoit's LVAC-200 offers quality performance at a lower price, including LED lights and a five-stage filtration system.

articles.title: YETI is dropping new seasonal colors on Feb. 14. Become a member for free to get first dibs
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: YETI is launching new seasonal colors and offering early access to account holders. Customers can create a free account to get first access to order the new collection and receive benefits like free shipping and early access to deals. More information about the launch will be available on Friday, Feb. 14.

articles.title: Honor announces DeepSeek-R1 support for flagship devices
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Honor has launched the DeepSeek R1 Network Edition for its high-end smartphones and foldables, integrating the new AI model with the YOYO Assistant. This feature enhances the AI agent by providing real-time network information and more thorough responses, accessible through a simple home screen gesture or the Honor Quick Service.

articles.title: The Arlo flagship battery-powered security camera is down to only $120
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Arlo Pro 5S 2K's brand-exclusive features previously made it challenging to recommend widely. A substantial markdown now makes it more accessible to a broader audience.

articles.title: Savvy shoppers can stock up on dishwasher tablets as Amazon launches 'limited time deal'
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Finish tablets receive positive reviews for their deep cleaning power, streak prevention, and ability to dissolve easily, even in cooler washes. Some users report issues with undissolved film or residue, while others praise the tablets as a substitute for rinse aid.

articles.title: YouTube Incorporates Google Veo AI Video Generation Tools Into Shorts
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: YouTube is enhancing Shorts creation by incorporating new generative AI features, including integration with Google DeepMind's Veo 2 model. This allows Shorts creators to generate both better-looking AI video backgrounds and entirely new, AI-originated short clips using text prompts. The new AI creation elements for YouTube Shorts are being rolled out to users in the U.S., Canada, Australia, and New Zealand.

articles.title: Amazon is holding a devices event on February 26, here's what to expect
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Amazon is set to launch a new, AI-infused version of Alexa on February 26th, promising enhanced capabilities like processing nuance and completing complex requests. The event may also feature updates to the Echo line of smart speakers and Echo Buds earbuds. This launch follows delays in the updated chatbot's development.

articles.title: OnePlus won't release a foldable phone in 2025
articles.author: Umar Shakir
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced it will not launch a new foldable phone this year, halting the development of a successor to the OnePlus Open. The company's product manager indicates that Oppo will lead in the foldable segment, and OnePlus will recalibrate its approach. The previous model, OnePlus Open, experienced successful sales in North America due to its alternative design.

articles.title: OnePlus won't bring Oppo's super-thin foldable to the US
articles.author: Umar Shakir
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced it will not launch a new foldable phone this year, halting the development of a sequel to its Open foldable. This decision involves Oppo taking the lead in the foldable segment, leading OnePlus to 'pause' on foldable devices for this generation and recalibrate its strategy. The company's last foldable device was the limited edition 'Apex Edition' launched last year.

articles.title: NYT Connections Feb 13: Hints and answers to solve today's challenge
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Elearnmarkets by StockEdge introduced A2Z Of Money under Finance education. Inara Marketers is providing Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands. Accenture Technology Lead, Trustworthy AI Center of Excellence: ATCI introduced AI and Analytics based Business Strategy.

articles.title: RM Soap Market launches Body Bar experience at new Albuquerque location
articles.author: Brody Foster
articles.summary: RM Soap Market launched its new Body Bar experience on February 1st at its Albuquerque location, which had a soft opening late last year. The Body Bar line enables customers to design their own handcrafted soap products, and the location also sells oils and lotions. The company also plans to open a micro-factory in Albuquerque in 2026.

articles.title: Amazon is holding a devices event on February 26, here's what to expect
articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.summary: Amazon is planning to reveal more details about its next-generation Alexa at an event on February 26. The new Alexa, powered by LLMs, is expected to process complex requests and has faced delays since being announced in 2023. Amazon may also introduce updated Echo smart speakers and Echo Buds.

articles.title: Zefr Expands Pre-Impression Content Avoidance for Meta Feed and Reels, Now Globally Available
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Zefr has expanded its pre-impression content avoidance controls on Meta, now globally available through the Zefr Max product. This service allows advertisers to customize brand suitability via customizable blocklists and real-time optimizations, building upon Meta's Inventory Filters. The offering provides real-time transparency dashboards for performance metrics and blocked content visibility.

articles.title: AI wants to Google for you
articles.author: Adam Clark Estes
articles.summary: OpenAI released 'Operator,' an AI agent available to ChatGPT Pro users, designed to perform tasks like online shopping and updating LinkedIn profiles. Currently a 'research preview,' Operator integrates with ChatGPT and can perform tasks such as buying a vacuum or initiating exchanges, with plans for future improvements based on user feedback.

articles.title: Shoppers are raving about this coverless duvet that's 'like sleeping under a CLOUD' - so I put it to the test
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Night Lark has introduced coverless duvets designed to replace traditional duvets and covers. These duvets feature built-in covers, innovative Smartfil fibers made from recycled PET plastic bottles, and peachskin microfibre for comfort. Several models are available, including the Seersucker Coverless Duvet Set, Natural Cotton Waffle Coverless Duvet, Eleanor Bowmer Leopard Coverless Duvet Set, Classic Tartan Coverless Duvet Set, Linen Print Coverless Duvet, Midnight Bloom Coverless Duvet Set, and Junior - In The Garden Children's Coverless Duvet Set, each with unique designs and materials.

articles.title: News Media Group, Inc. and Digital Lifestyle Expert Mario Armstrong worked with Adobe on a National Satellite Media Tour to Help Introduce the New AI-Powered Contract Intelligence Featured in Acrobat AI Assistant
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Adobe launched contract intelligence in Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant. This new feature aims to simplify contract comprehension for consumers by helping them understand complex terms and identify differences between agreements. The tool is designed to save users time and prevent surprises in various everyday agreements.

articles.title: News Media Group, Inc. and Digital Lifestyle Expert Mario Armstrong worked with Adobe on a National Satellite Media Tour to Help Introduce the New AI-Powered Contract Intelligence Featured in Acrobat AI Assistant
articles.author: Karl Wayne
articles.summary: Adobe has launched contract intelligence in Adobe Acrobat AI Assistant, a new feature designed to simplify contract comprehension for consumers. This tool allows users to quickly grasp crucial information, compare contracts, and verify details in a secure environment, helping them make better-informed decisions on everyday agreements.

articles.title: Liquid Hand Soap Market to Reach USD 560.27 Billion by 2033
articles.summary: The liquid hand soap market sees a wave of product innovations and formulation improvements, marked by a 75% increase in patents.  Dial® introduced Concentrated Refills, reducing plastic usage by 95%. There's also a surge in niche categories like organic/natural soaps (266% increase) and antibacterial offerings (300% increase).

articles.title: Best budget tablets in 2025 for outstanding value
articles.author: Sam Kieldsen
articles.summary: The article reviews several recently launched budget-friendly tablets from companies like Amazon (Fire Max 11), OnePlus (OnePlus Pad), Samsung (Galaxy Tab S9 FE), Lenovo (Tab P12), Redmi (Pad SE), Honor (Pad X9), TCL (Nxtpaper 11), Huawei (MatePad 11.5in PaperMatte Edition), and Nokia (T10). These tablets offer various features, including vibrant displays, decent processors, and stylus support, catering to users seeking affordable alternatives for streaming, gaming, and light productivity.

articles.title: ServiceNow Launches New Product Suite to Enhance Government Efficiency
articles.summary: ServiceNow launched the Government Transformation Suite, a new product designed to increase visibility, accelerate ROI, and drive efficiency for U.S. federal agencies. The suite helps agencies manage assets, save time, optimize software investments, and transform the government worker experience. It is now available in U.S.-based regulated cloud environments and commercial Data Centers, with implementation support from Accenture Federal Services and Intact.

articles.title: 27 Walmart Products For Savvy Thirtysomethings Who Love Getting A Good Bang For Their Buck
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Walmart is featuring a selection of new or noteworthy products. These include the Revlon 2-in-1 hair styling tool, the Instant Pot, Mighty Patch pimple patches, Duo Cubes toilet cleaner, Lumify eye drops, the Tasty line red 24-piece nonstick cookware set, electric toothbrushes and a Google Nest smart thermostat, among others. The article is showcasing these products for their functionality and value.

articles.title: Kia Philippines brings in the New Sorento Turbo Hybrid
articles.author: Randy S. Peregrino
articles.summary: Kia Philippines has introduced the new Kia Sorento Turbo Hybrid, its first hybrid powertrain for the Sorento nameplate, replacing turbodiesel variants. The Sorento Turbo Hybrid features a 1.6-liter turbocharged engine combined with an electric motor, delivering over 230 hp and 367 N-m of torque, and comes with premium features and advanced driver assistance systems with prices ranging from P2.188 million to P2.888 million.

articles.title: Broadvoice Receives Industry-Leading Net Promoter Score® for Customer Loyalty and Satisfaction
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Broadvoice announced that its CCaaS solution, GoContact platform, received a Net Promoter Score of 60, exceeding the SaaS sector average. GoContact is a cloud-native contact center combining cloud, containers, microservices, AI, and advanced analytics. Broadvoice's customer satisfaction rating is 93%, and its Customer Orientation and Customer Success scores are 100%.

articles.title: The best phone to buy right now
articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.summary: The article highlights upcoming smartphones including the iPhone 16 series with new features like the Action Button and Camera Control, the Google Pixel 9 series emphasizing AI features and improved performance, and the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra with its multi-camera system. It also covers the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 6 with updated cover screen UI and the Nothing Phone 2 known for its unique design.

articles.title: Lonnie Johnson: The inventor of the Super Soaker
articles.author: Don Wilburn Independent Staff
articles.summary: Lonnie Johnson's 'Super Soaker' water gun was a popular toy that sold over ad_ million units. Originally patented in 1986, the toy was involved in patent disputes and revisions leading to updated versions. Johnson's creation significantly impacted the water toy market.

articles.title: We Tried And Ranked 28 Lindt Lindor Truffle Flavors
articles.author: Michael Palan
articles.summary: Lindt introduced several new Lindor truffle flavors, including Raspberry Cheesecake (2025), Birthday Cake (2023), and Tiramisu (2024).  They also launched non-dairy Oatmilk versions in 2023 and updated existing flavors like Sea Salt Caramel. These additions represent the company's ongoing product development and flavor expansions within the Lindt Lindor line.

articles.title: Walmart is having a 50% off sale on the Dyson cordless vacuum but it won't last for long
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum, which is 33% lighter than the Dyson V11, for $250 (originally $500). The vacuum features up to 40 minutes of fade-free suction and comes with multiple attachments for versatile cleaning, including a crevice tool and combination tool.

articles.title: Food allergy? Here's how you can filter food on Swiggy
articles.summary: Swiggy app users should update their app to access the latest features and improvements. This includes new advanced filters, such as allergen filters, designed to transform the food ordering experience.

articles.title: Asus launches Vivobook and Zenbook laptop lineup with AI-powered features: Price, specs and more
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ASUS has introduced a new lineup of AI-powered laptops, including the Vivobook 14 Flip featuring a 14-inch FHD+ OLED touchscreen, Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, and 16GB RAM. The series aims to enhance productivity and simplify workflows with intelligent features. Other models like Zenbook 14, Vivobook 16, ASUS Gaming V16, Vivobook Pro 14 OLED and Zenbook Duo series are also launched with different features and specifications, catering to diverse user needs and budgets.

articles.title: New AI Platform Unlocks Personalized Nutrition Intelligence
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: IndulgeRx Brands Inc. has launched a new AI platform that generates Relevant Nutrition Scores (RNS), providing individualized insights on consumables. The platform analyzes ingredients, additives, packaging, and preparation techniques, offering tailored insights for various stakeholders. FightBack Foods line served as a prototype for the new AI platform.

articles.title: New JYSK store to open in Trenton, says global retailer
articles.author: Postmedia Staff
articles.summary: JYSK is opening a new store in Trenton, Quinte West, marking its 71st location in Canada. This new 21,000-plus square-foot store features a 3.0 concept layout displaying Scandinavian home furnishings and has created new jobs. JYSK offers unique product designs and an intimate shopping experience.

articles.title: Direct Digital Holdings' AI Council Launches "Demystifying AI" Ebook to Bridge the Enterprise AI Divide
articles.author: Direct Digital Holdings
articles.summary: Direct Digital Holdings, operating through Colossus Media, LLC and Orange 142, released "Demystifying AI," the first ebook in its AI Council series. This guide is designed to help small and mid-market business leaders understand and navigate generative AI adoption, addressing the divide between organizations embracing and hesitant towards AI.

articles.title: Taking AI to the playground: LinkedIn combines LLMs, LangChain and Jupyter Notebooks to improve prompt engineering
articles.summary: LinkedIn, owned by Microsoft, launched a 'collaborative prompt engineering playground' utilizing LLMs, LangChain, and Jupyter Notebooks. This platform aims to improve AI features, exemplified by AccountIQ within LinkedIn's Sales Navigator, which reduces company research time. The playground allows technical and non-technical users to collaborate on prompt engineering.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands' CWENCH Hydration™ is Now Available in All Fortinos Supermarkets Across Ontario
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands Corporation is launching its Rinse Chewing Gum in Fortinos stores. This functional chewing gum aims to offer oral care benefits and is now available in all Fortinos locations. Cizzle Brands is focused on expanding the availability of its chewing gum products in the market.

articles.title: Help Scout Launches Availability in AWS Marketplace
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Help Scout announced that its customer support platform is now available in the AWS Marketplace. This allows AWS customers to access Help Scout for customer service and streamline its purchase and management. The availability in AWS Marketplace provides businesses an easier way to adopt a secure, scalable, and reliable support solution.

articles.title: 'All My 8 Wigs Are From There': Woman Flaunts Gorgeous Wig From Dragon City Worth R450, SA Wowed
articles.author: Bongiwe Mati
articles.summary: Dragon City is highlighted for its quality wig, specifically a 6-inch wig purchased for R450 from Angela's Weaves (shop D43). A customer shared her positive unboxing experience on TikTok, mentioning the quick delivery and non-synthetic quality of the hair, which lead to increased customer interest in Dragon City products.

articles.title: In China's cutthroat phone market, AI becomes a necessity, not a luxury
articles.author: Zhu Shenshen
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series in Shanghai, highlighting AI capabilities with an upgraded Bixby AI bot. Apple is reportedly partnering with Alibaba to offer localized Apple Intelligence services in China, aiming to reverse sales decline amidst competition from Huawei, Vivo and Xiaomi.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman: I use AI in these ‘boring ways,' in my everyday life
articles.author: Megan Sauer
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, an agentic AI model integrated into ChatGPT, designed to automate tasks like planning vacations and ordering groceries. Google also released its own agentic AI product. Several other companies, including Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, and Anthropic are developing their own versions of AI agents.

articles.title: Taking AI to the playground: LinkedIn combines LLMs, LangChain and Jupyter Notebooks to improve prompt engineering
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: LinkedIn developed a 'collaborative prompt engineering playground' using technologies like LLMs, LangChain, and Jupyter Notebooks to improve its sales navigator product. This resulted in AI-powered features, particularly AccountIQ, which reduces company research time significantly.

articles.title: Tech Entrepreneur Transforms Personal Struggle into Revolutionary AI Platform Called Magai
articles.summary: Magai, a new AI platform founded by Dustin Stout, consolidates AI chatbots, image generators, and video creation tools into one interface. Launched recently, the platform has achieved six-figure revenue in less than six months and is being adopted by agencies, consultants, and institutions like the University of Notre Dame.

articles.title: Samsung, LG unveil AI-powered home devices to fend off Chinese rivals
articles.author: 인간지표의 돈되는 이야기 부업 주식
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a new 55-inch OLED TV with upgraded AI capabilities, including the 'AI Smart Home' function and an 'AI button' on the remote. LG introduced AI-powered air conditioners that operate on voice commands and a massage chair that uses AI to personalize the massage experience. Both companies are also focusing on enhanced security features in their new products.

articles.title: 'Impressive' Shark Stratos vacuum cleaner is £210 off in cheapest-ever Amazon deal
articles.author: Jake Hackney Reporter
articles.summary: Shark's Stratos vacuum cleaner, featuring 'anti hair wrap plus technology' and 'Clean Sense IQ feature', is being offered at a discounted price. The vacuum includes a removable battery with up to 60 minutes of runtime and accessories like a motorized pet tool.

articles.title: Nutty Cruiser set to distribute almond samples across the U.S.
articles.summary: Blue Diamond Growers is launching "The Nutty Cruiser" on National Almond Day, February 16, 2025, to distribute one million almond samples across the U.S. The initiative includes sampling new flavors of Snack Almonds, Almond Breeze Almondmilk, Nut Thins, and Almond Flour at various stops throughout the country.

articles.title: Beauty fans love 'all rounder' exfoliating toner that's less than €10
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: The Ordinary's Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner is highlighted as a budget-friendly skincare product suitable for face, body, and scalp, containing glycolic acid and natural extracts. Curel Hydrating Gel Essence, is introduced as a non-exfoliating option utilizing ceramides and eucalyptus to protect the skin barrier.

articles.title: Sprinklr Announces New Integration with Bluesky for Insights and Publishing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sprinklr, the Unified-CXM platform, announced a new integration with Bluesky. This integration facilitates insights and content publishing.

articles.title: Fujitsu to offer Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform for secure and flexible enterprise data management  Feb. 13, 2025 12:24
articles.summary: Fujitsu is launching the Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform in Japan during fiscal year 2025, with a global rollout planned. The service combines data confidentiality with the ease of cloud use and includes the Takane large language model. Fujitsu will add this service to its Fujitsu Computing as a Service portfolio, offering comprehensive support.

articles.title: HanesBrands Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Results
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: HanesBrands reported a 3% increase in U.S. net sales driven by innerwear innovation, featuring Hanes Absolute Socks, Hanes Moves, Hanes Supersoft, and Bali Breathe. The operating margin increased by approximately 525 basis points due to cost savings initiatives and lower input costs, which helped fund a 30% increase in brand investments to drive consumer demand behind new product innovation in both Men's and Women's categories.

articles.title: The Benefits of Headless CMS for Modern Web Development
articles.author: Vishakha Srivastava
articles.summary: The article describes Headless CMS as a modern solution for content management, offering greater flexibility, faster performance, and seamless omnichannel content delivery compared to traditional CMS. It enables businesses to create custom, scalable, and secure websites with improved user experiences. Headless CMS simplifies content management and workflow automation, allowing companies to adapt to evolving digital technologies and future-proof their websites.

articles.title: Save £100 on your next Samsung purchase with this discount code
articles.author: Mollie Davies
articles.summary: Samsung is offering discounts on various products like the Galaxy S25 Ultra, see-through fridge, QN90D neo QLED TV, Galaxy S24, and Galaxy S24 Ultra. Customers can use discount codes like 'APP5' for 5% off their first order or 'SHARELOVE' for £100 off selected products. Furthermore, teachers and key workers can often get a standard 10% discount.

articles.title: When It Comes To Experience, We Must Stay Human In An AI World
articles.author: Shep Hyken
articles.summary: Mark Schaefer launched his new book, "Audacious: How Humans Win in an AI Marketing World," which explores the role of humans in an AI-driven world, especially in customer service. The book cover uses generative AI to create unique images for each reader through a QR code, offering a 'one-of-a-kind art show'.

articles.title: Cricket Debut S3 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Cricket has launched the Debut S3 smartphone, featuring a 6.56-inch display, MediaTek Helio P35 processor, 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, and a 13MP + 2MP dual-camera setup. The phone operates on Android 14 and is powered by a 4000 mAh battery, with a launch price starting at P2,023.09.

articles.title: Samsung launches latest AI-powered OLED TV
articles.author: 루트원의 꼭꼭 씹어주는 청약과 재재
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched a new OLED television with AI smart home capabilities. The new TV features real-time subtitle translation and automatic picture and sound customization through its 'AI Mode.' Additionally, it incorporates AI-driven smart home functions offering personalized home management suggestions and real-time home security alerts.

articles.title: Gupshup launches AI Agents for D2C, Retail, e-comm, and FMCG
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Gupshup launched AI Agents for D2C, Retail, e-commerce, and FMCG, which is part of Gupshup's AI Agent Library. These agents facilitate product discovery, automate order management, and personalize customer interactions by integrating across omnichannel environments. These agents are designed to enhance engagement and drive measurable impact for businesses.

articles.title: AI can use your computer now. Should it?
articles.author: Adam Clark Estes
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Operator', an AI agent for ChatGPT Pro users, which can perform tasks like buying groceries and updating LinkedIn profiles. Currently in a 'research preview' stage, Operator is slow and makes mistakes, but OpenAI plans to refine it based on user feedback. The aim is to integrate Operator seamlessly into ChatGPT, enabling users to delegate tasks and automate processes, though limitations exist in its current form.

articles.title: 7 low-budget business ideas that actually work in Nigeria
articles.summary: The article outlines several business opportunities in Nigeria. These include digital services (social media management, graphic design, content creation), poultry farming, mobile food vending, laundry and ironing services, event planning and decoration, car wash and detailing, and mobile barbering or hairdressing. Each idea is presented as a potentially new service or product to offer within the Nigerian market.

articles.title: The giant is coming: The machine that will solve the most annoying problem for large families
articles.author: MEITAL SHARABI
articles.summary: Haier is launching the HW150-B14986ES8 washing machine in Israel, featuring a 15 kg capacity and designed for large families. The machine includes 14 programs, steam sterilization, a Refresh function, i-time customization, Antibacterial Treatment (ABT), and a Smart Dual Spray system.

articles.title: Crypto with strong potential: Exploring a token's market performance
articles.author: Spotlight Wire
articles.summary: Dawgz AI has launched a utility token with AI-powered trading bots designed to maximize ROI in the Ethereum market. The presale has already raised over $1.1M, and the tokenomics are structured for long-term growth with automated trading operating 24/7.

articles.title: VOOPOO VINCI Spark220: Light Yet Advanced, Stars in Your Grasp
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Shenzhen (3rd Floor) Technology Co., Ltd. (SZT) has launched its 'xPod' vaping device. The xPod features innovative technology, including a customizable chipset and enhanced safety features, addressing the stagnancy in the vaping industry with a focus on user experience and advanced functionality. The device boasts a 0.6Ω coil and offers both MTL and DTL vaping experiences.

articles.title: Noah SS25 Sets Sail on a Journey of Renewal and Refinement
articles.summary: NOAH is launching its SS25 collection, featuring updated staples like canvas jackets and seersucker suits, alongside returning classics in a fresh color palette. The collection emphasizes tailoring with materials from top-quality mills and introduces a collaboration with Barbour. The first delivery of NOAH's SS25 collection will be released today at 11 a.m.

articles.title: Laneige Presents New Water Bank Range At The Laneige Show
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: Laneige launched the newly engineered Water Bank range, featuring Blue Hyaluronic Acid for deep skin hydration. The range includes the Water Bank Gentle Gel Cleanser, a mildly acidic cleanser, and updated Water Bank Gel Cream and Water Bank Moisture Cream with eco-conscious packaging. They also have promotions such as a 40% discount on water bank sets.

articles.title: Gupshup Accelerates AI Adoption For Businesses with Pre-Built, Industry-Trained, Multimodal AI Agents
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Gupshup has launched specialized AI Agents for businesses across multiple industries, including retail, fintech, and travel. The initial release features agents like the Lead Generation AI Agent, which autonomously collects and qualifies leads, and the Product Discovery AI Agent, which accelerates sales through product recommendations. These AI agents are designed to enhance customer engagement and drive business results.

articles.title: Three tech start-ups using AI to boost publisher ad revenue
articles.author: Paul Hood
articles.summary: The article introduces three new adtech startups with innovative solutions for digital advertising. Nodals AI helps publishers use first-party data to improve ad targeting. Anonymised offers ID-less advertising technology for better reach, and Welect allows readers to choose ads, potentially increasing engagement and revenue for publishers.

articles.title: Gupshup Accelerates AI Adoption For Businesses with Pre-Built, Industry-Trained, Multimodal AI Agents
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: Gupshup launched its AI Agent Library, a suite of 15 pre-built and customizable AI Agents. These agents are designed for B2C engagement across various industries and integrate with multiple channels like WhatsApp and SMS. The AI Agent Library aims to accelerate revenue growth and improve customer experience.

articles.title: The Unbreakable AI Smartphone, HONOR X9c, Touches Down In Mzansi
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X9c, an AI Smartphone, now available online at leading retailers, with pricing starting from R10,999. The X9c features an Anti-Drop Display, IP65M-rated water and dust resistance, a 6600mAh Silicon-carbon battery with 66W HONOR SuperCharge, and AI-enhanced photography capabilities.

articles.title: Nikon's new 28-135mm f/4 PZ lens brings power zoom & pro video features
articles.author: Sebastian Oakley
articles.summary: Nikon has launched the Nikkor Z 28-135mm f/4 PZ lens, its first Power Zoom lens for FX-format mirrorless cameras, targeting professional videographers. The lens features a 28-135mm focal range, internal focusing, power zoom functionality with customizable speeds, and compatibility with Nikon's Z9, Z8, and Z6 III cameras and professional accessories. The Nikon Z 28-135mm f/4 Power Zoom Lens is priced at $2,596.95 / £2,499 / AU$3,399.

articles.title: Shoyu Ro: Transforming businesses with cutting-edge technology
articles.summary: LR Inc. has developed a generative AI tool that enables businesses to create internal chatbots for enhanced productivity. The company is also currently developing an AI-powered enterprise product designed to enhance company operations leveraging AI. This AI product aims to become a globally recognized solution for companies worldwide.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer and this AI tool built my 'perfect' skincare routine for free'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Noli, an AI-powered platform, has launched a service that creates personalized skincare routines using a diagnostic quiz and facial scan, generating a 'BeautyDNA' profile. Users can purchase their recommended skincare routine with a 30% discount. The platform suggests products and alternative options and also gives extra advice on the ingredients for skin.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer and this AI tool built my 'perfect' skincare routine for free'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Noli has launched an AI-powered skincare platform providing personalized routines via a free AI-powered facial scan. The platform recommends skincare bundles with a 30% discount, and also suggests alternative product substitutions. The service aims to offer a seamless experience for building effective skincare routines.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer - an AI tool built my 'perfect' skincare ritual'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Noli has launched an AI-powered platform that analyzes skin and generates personalized skincare routines. Users can use the platform's diagnostic quiz and facial scan to get a BeautyDNA profile and a recommended skincare routine, with a 30% discount on purchases. The platform suggests products from brands like Kiehl's, L'Oreal Paris, and CeraVe and also recommends alternative products.

articles.title: Nikon Unveils the NIKKOR Z 28-135mm f/4 PZ Lens for Professional Videographers
articles.summary: Nikon India Pvt. Ltd. introduced the NIKKOR Z 28-135mm f/4 PZ lens, designed for full-frame mirrorless cameras with a Z mount and announced on October 30, 2024. The lens features a power zoom system with 11 zoom speeds, minimizes focus shifts during zooming, and supports 8K video capture. It also includes dust- and drip-resistance, ensuring durability.

articles.title: Valentine's Day 2025: Last Minute But Totally Worth-It Gifts For Your Beloved
articles.author: Riya Ashok Madayi
articles.summary: Several companies, including Zen Diamond, Mayskin, Seven Oral Care, Samāh, Drunch, Reema Anand Label, Drawn, Aveda, epres, Dr.Su, Ikonic, Calecim Professional, ROS Beauty, Ministry of Pedicure, Skin Deli, Skinvest, moha, Indulgeo Essentials, Rare'Z, Rare Rabbit, PAC Cosmetics, Lenskart, and Plush, have launched new products and services for Valentine's Day 2025. These include jewelry, skincare, oral care, apparel, accessories, and wellness products like the Heart-Shaped Diamond Necklace from Zen Diamond, Sunny Drip sunscreen from Mayskin, Sonic Toothbrush from Seven Oral Care, Seed Cycling Blend from Samāh, Sangria Metallic Red Heels from Drunch, Gilded Patchwork Midi Dress from Drawn, Nutriplenish Shampoo Deep Moisture from Aveda, Healthy Hair 3-Step System Starter Kit from epres, Dr.Su's Exosome Plump Party Serum, Ikonic Gleam 3.0 Hair Straightener, Calecim Professional's Advanced Hair System Kit, ROS Beauty's Sparkle Girlie nail stickies, Ministry of Pedicure's Bombini Lush Mani – Pedi, Skin Deli Brightening Face Serum, Skinvest's Face Hug Barrier Repair Moisturizer, moha Lip Scrub, Indulgeo Essentials Rosemary and Rice Water Mist, MERCURE – METALLIC RED sneakers by Rare'Z, MANDARIN REGULAR FIT SHIRT and other shirts by Rare Rabbit, COLOR BLOCK SWEATSHIRT by Rare Rabbit, FLAT KNIT ZIPPER POLO by Rare Rabbit, PAC Cosmetics XOXO Lip Crayon Kit, Plush HERmergency Hamper, Plush Lovestruck Combo, Lenskart Phonic Collection. Each product aims to offer a unique gifting option for the holiday.

articles.title: The Transformative Power of AI in Marketing Operations
articles.author: Forbes Tech
articles.summary: ALDO uses AI to personalize customer experiences and optimize marketing campaigns. Marketers are using AI to optimize email campaigns by testing subject lines and analyzing customer behavior. Conversational AI has evolved into sophisticated systems capable of simulating natural human conversations and tailoring responses based on individual customer profiles.

articles.title: Phynd raises $10M for subscription-free smart TV cloud gaming platform
articles.author: Dean Takahashi
articles.summary: Phynd is launching a subscription-free cloud gaming platform for smart TVs, planning a beta launch in 2025. They have raised $10 million in a seed round led by Wellington Management to fuel the platform's development. The company aims to make high-quality gaming universally accessible and connect brand marketers with the gaming audience.

articles.title: Amazon joins quick commerce race, to focus on beauty and home next
articles.author: Digbijay Mishra
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its 10-minute delivery service, Amazon Now, in select Bengaluru localities, expanding beyond its employee pilot program. The company is onboarding brands in beauty, home, and kitchen categories as part of its scaling efforts and is primarily selling grocery and daily essentials currently.

articles.title: New Data Center in Indonesia Further Expands Creatio's Cloud Capabilities
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Creatio launched a new data center in Jakarta, hosted by Amazon Web Services (AWS), to enhance software performance and scalability for ASEAN customers. This expansion allows businesses to leverage a secure and scalable environment, ensuring compliance and accelerating digital transformation. The Jakarta data center is part of Creatio's global expansion strategy driven by the demand for CRM and no-code solutions.

articles.title: Suzuki Australia employs AI for hotline help
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Suzuki Australia is introducing 'Hey Suzi', an AI-powered customer service system developed by Contact Harald. This service aims to streamline customer interactions by automating service bookings, handling inquiries, and providing roadside assistance.  Future plans include personalized promotional offers via 'Hey Suzi' to enhance customer engagement and sales.

articles.title: Fujitsu to offer Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform for secure and flexible enterprise data management
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Fujitsu launched the Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform which combines data confidentiality with cloud usability. The service will initially be available in Japan during fiscal year 2025, with a global rollout planned and Fujitsu will begin accepting trial applications for this service in Japan starting February 13, 2025. The platform incorporates Fsas Technologies Inc.'s Private AI Platform on PRIMERGY, Supermicro's GPU servers, and Fujitsu's Takane large language model.

articles.title: Fujitsu to offer Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform for secure and flexible enterprise data management
articles.author: Fujitsu Limited
articles.summary: Fujitsu announced the launch of the Fujitsu Cloud Service Generative AI Platform. The new service will be available in Japan during fiscal year 2025, followed by a global rollout. Fujitsu will begin accepting applications for a trial of this service in Japan starting February 13, 2025.

articles.title: Suzuki Australia employs AI for hotline help
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Suzuki Australia is launching 'Hey Suzi', an AI-powered customer service system developed with Contact Harald. 'Hey Suzi' is designed to streamline customer service tasks such as service bookings and inquiries, and it will be rolled out across Suzuki Australia's dealerships. In the future, 'Hey Suzi' will offer personalized promotions to customers.

articles.title: Suzuki Australia employs AI for hotline help
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Suzuki Australia introduced Suzi, a new artificial intelligence (AI) helper, for customer interactions.

articles.title: Suzuki Australia employs AI for hotline help
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Suzuki Australia is introducing 'Hey Suzi', an AI-powered customer service assistant, across its dealerships to streamline customer service. This service, derived from Contact Harald's 'Ask Harry' AI product, allows customers to book services, make inquiries, and access roadside assistance. In the future, 'Hey Suzi' will also include a promotion feature, reaching out to existing customers with personalised offers and promotions.

articles.title: DreamSmart launched new product event in the Philippines, deepening its development in the Southeast Asian market
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: DreamSmart, in collaboration with Geely Auto, launched MEIZU Note 21, Mblu 21 smartphones, and a range of smart products, including smart glasses, tablets, rings, and watches, in the Philippines. The Mblu 21 features a 6.79-inch display, a 13-megapixel dual-camera system, and a 4,900mAh battery. DreamSmart also demonstrated its All-in-AI ecosystem, connecting devices like smartphones, smart cars, and wearables through Flyme AIOS.

articles.title: 이랜드이츠 테루, 치즈 퐁듀 돈카츠 리뉴얼 출시
articles.author: 김혜연 기자
articles.summary: Elandeats' tonkatsu restaurant, Teru, relaunched its signature 'Cheese Fondue Tonkatsu' on February 12. The revamped menu features skewered tonkatsu pieces with cheddar and mozzarella cheese fondue, accompanied by a mini curry, salad, rice, and other sides. The menu was first released at Teru NC Department Store Gangseo, and will expand to other stores in the future.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Series, Gen Z Solution to Ngonten is easier to use AI • Jagat Review
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series with new AI-powered features like 'AI Select' and 'Generative Edit'. The 'AI Select' intelligently selects the best shots, while 'Generative Edit' allows generating multiple video variations based on themes.  These tools revolutionize content creation by making it easier for users to capture, edit, and personalize content.

articles.title: Council Post: Reinventing The Wheel: How Brands Can Disrupt The Market With GenAI
articles.author: Vanina Marcote
articles.summary: Companies are leveraging GenAI in marketing to rethink business strategies and optimize processes. IBM reports that implementing AI tools can reduce customer service costs by 30%. The adoption of AI facilitates hyper-personalization, multilingual translation, and streamlining operations, providing businesses with opportunities to enhance productivity, improve customer experience, and achieve cost savings.

articles.title: Council Post: Business Websites: Focus On These User-Centric Features
articles.author: Expert Panel®
articles.summary: Duda Inc. is optimizing websites for AI-driven search using chatbots. Cummins Inc. emphasizes AI-driven personalization to enhance user engagement. Neem Inc. will feature dynamic demos personalized through AI.

articles.title: SAP BrandVoice: How AI Liberates Marketing Operations From Data Overload
articles.author: Namita Gupta-Hehl
articles.summary: ALDO utilizes SAP's Business AI tools to gain insights into its marketing operations. AI is being used to personalize content, optimize email campaigns through A/B testing, automate repetitive tasks, and generate insightful reports for better decision-making. These applications enhance marketing operations by improving efficiency and enabling data-driven strategies.

articles.title: MOROCCANOIL® LAUNCHES L'ORIGINALE EAU DE PARFUM, ITS FIRST-EVER FINE FRAGRANCE, STARRING ADRIA ARJONA
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: Moroccanoil launched its first fine fragrance, L'Originale Eau de Parfum, fulfilling years of customer requests. The fragrance expands the brand into the fine fragrance category and is intended to evoke a Mediterranean experience.

articles.title: Garmin Tactix 8 just launched, and it might be the most formidable Garmin ever
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Garmin unveiled the new Tactix 8. The announcement indicates a new product launch from the company.

articles.title: Bridging Worlds: Vugar Usi Zade on Blockchain, Finance, and the Future of Innovation
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Bitget is committed to enhancing the trading experience. It offers innovative solutions such as its pioneering copy trading feature.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign is arriving in May and you can pre-order it now
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Elden Ring Nightreign's release date has been announced, and special editions are now available for pre-order.

articles.title: XPENG announces its official launch in the UK, showcasing smart mobility lineups including world's first ...
articles.author: Malaysian National News Agency
articles.summary: Xpeng officially launched in the UK. The launch showcased smart mobility lineups. The lineups include the world's first AI-defined vehicle and a flying car.

articles.title: PNM customers soar together with Whoosh high-speed train
articles.author: Front Row
articles.summary: Permodalan Nasional Madani (PNM) has enabled its PNM Mekaar customers' products, including Emdi Kripik and Ratnamoy, to be available at ICY & SPICY and Crunchy Buddy stores within the Whoosh high-speed train service area. This initiative aims to broaden the market reach for these female entrepreneurs and their flagship products.

articles.title: Noise Master Buds: Indulge unboxing
articles.author: Farhaan Tipu
articles.summary: The Noise Master Buds are launching with premium sound, 49dB Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), and a next-level design.
